website_summaries.verdict: A versatile medium-size bag with a classic kate spade look.
pros: This satchel is on the medium to large size and has a traditional style that works with nearly any outfit
The leather and hardware are durable
Customers love the relatively spacious design of this moderately sized bag
cons: A few customers express concerns about the durability of the strap

customer_reviews.title: Surely one of the BEST bags
customer_reviews.text: I have both the Tile Blue Multi and the Toasted Wheat Multi, and I LOVE them both so much that I'm planning on purchasing the Evergreen next. Each bag is very well-made, and accommodates a lot of items, including my 8-inch clutch-wallet, 7-inch hold-anything case, sunglasses, keys, cell phone (iPhone 6), pens, coin purse, and other items. Whether the bag is empty or full, it stands sturdily on its four metal feet. The saffiano leather is stain-resistant with its color uniform throughout. The quality is topnotch, and the price is reasonable. I say go get yourself one, or more. You deserve this beautiful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Kate Spade Lover
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely bag - my second that I've purchased from Amazon sellers. This one gets as many compliments as the first, which was a cute navy with ballerina pink large polka dots. They are so well made and stylish. Forget Pokemon, I gotta collect all of these!!
customer_reviews.author: D. West

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Handbag!
customer_reviews.text: I have a number of Kate Spade bags. I wanted a bag large enough to take to Europe on a 10 day trip without being some giant tote. This bag fir the bill perfectly. It held everything I needed it to. The outer pocket was great for storing my passport and boarding pass. I loved the full zip top for security. The bag has wonderful structure and really cute fabric lining. It's my new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: The best purse I've ever purchased regardless of brand.
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse, and I'm a purse girl! So so classy that I get compliments even from men..the inside is even pretty! Is has lots of room without being overpowering. There is a discrete pocket closure on the outside, a zippered on inside two decided easy access pockets for cell, and credit cards/ mad money.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Shrewsberry

customer_reviews.title: Missing shoulder strap
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my initial review didn’t meet posting guidelines so I’ll try this again. The handbag was delivered on time, nicely packaged in a box. The problem I had was it was missing the attachable shoulder strap. The strap is always located inside of the purse. The picture online clearly shows the strap. This was an important feature for me as I always use the strap option on my purse. The other KS bags I have are from department stores and while this bag was nice it was extremely hard and stiff. Don’t expect a soft supple leather. I returned the very next day after receiving. I couldn’t keep something this costly with a missing piece.
customer_reviews.author: KLR

customer_reviews.title: The purse is well-made with excellent attention to detail
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this satchel for my wife for Christmas. She loves it. The purse is well-made with excellent attention to detail. The the two-tone coloring is eye-catching, and the stitching is perfect. In my opinion, it looks more expensive than its price. As a guy who notices a well-dressed woman, I highly recommend this elegant satchel.
customer_reviews.author: Nomacgenius

customer_reviews.title: Wears like iron!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to take on vacation, but have ended up using it for work. I use it every day and it looks as good now as the day I bought it. There are two slim pockets for phones or badges and plenty of room in the interior for a wallet, a small makeup bag, oral hygiene supplies, and more. I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Reece

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: within 4 months my straps are falling apart. Any type of warranty on this happening? I paid good money for this purse and wouldn't think the straps would start falling apart
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A Shrader

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag
customer_reviews.text: It is a great bag. A little bigger than I wanted, but it is a wonderful purse. I have to make sure not to add too many things. A true Kate Spade with the stripe lining!! So great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another Amazing Purse
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this design! Kate Spade never fails to impress me. Plenty of room for everything I need, and it looks adorable with or without the shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyanne Farr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse. The size is great. I kept buying purses too small or way too large. This is roomy. I love the quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie H.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous bag!! My husband bought me this for my birthday and I could not be happier!! Such a classy well made bag! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To celebrate her 40th
customer_reviews.text: My step-daughter loves Kate Spade, so to soften the blow, I purchased this bag to celebrate her 40th birthday. I loved the color and that the bottom was dark and wouldn't show any dirt. She absolutely loved it - I also purchased a wallet and sunglasses to match. Great price and wonderful quality.
customer_reviews.author: tfvrs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size, high quality! Can fit a document folder, book, phone, wallet etc. . .
customer_reviews.author: hillsing

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It is the perfect size. The first one I received I returned because it looked like something had been laid on it during shipping and damaged the bag - I reordered and the second one is just fine. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jill E DelRoss

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag, color is as it looks on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bag, color is as it looks on the pic. The only con is it was smaller than I envisioned, but that's not anyone's fault. I'm able to put files in but that sticks up a bit out the top. Love the bag and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: M. Barker

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this purse
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this purse! Everyone keeps asking me about it. I was a little skeptical of the color because of the pictures, but to my surprise is was true to it. The plum color is so beautiful, and great for the upcoming fall season. Can't wait to get another one!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Nubcake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments on this purse. Holds plenty of supplies!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: Definitely more than I wanted to spend, but I love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful classy purse.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice purse. Bag is large. More like a tote bag type concept. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Edgar

customer_reviews.title: I got what it was describe and the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item i Saturday and I got it Monday. I got what it was describe and the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: VIRNELL C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her purse. Seems well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great hand bag
customer_reviews.text: Great hand bag it's the perfect size and gorgeous quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purse, really well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is really sturdy, fits my macbook air and is really well made -- love this for work and it's small enough to use as an everyday bag!
customer_reviews.author: lucylover1312

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag and the color is great. Received many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Falco

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, and with my Prime membership price of $189.00 it was a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Author

customer_reviews.title: As expected!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like I expected. Came with its cover bag, just perfect. My wife totally loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks a bit like a briefcase, but the size and color are perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: kimRoss

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag--but definitely NOT mahogany--it is more of an eggplant
customer_reviews.author: Mullslabs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I get lots of compliments. I wish there were more compartments for organization.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Poole

customer_reviews.title: it came in excellent condition, too
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this purse, it came in excellent condition, too.
customer_reviews.author: outlawpickle

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty purse, perfect for Spring & Summer
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty purse, perfect for Spring & Summer! I love the outer pocket that you can slide your phone and lip gloss in for easy access. I’ve received lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Gyenes-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the new purse; size, color and quality of the product
customer_reviews.author: Harry Barr

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what I ordered. It's very high quality and definitely a real Kate Spade. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ambivert_clair

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bag just didn’t think it would be as big as it was when I received the package
customer_reviews.author: Stefani Jo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: love this bag
customer_reviews.text: love this bag.. it's so pretty in person. got it for an excellent price also with fast shipping to Australia. so happy!
customer_reviews.author: i am me

customer_reviews.title: Classic Handbag
customer_reviews.text: Classic style; works with jeans or a suit. Love that it is light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I like the style, design, color and texture of the bag! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Head Turner.
customer_reviews.text: This is one great purse. Stylish and functional. The two colors are fantastic together. Women see my Kate Spade and there is envy in their eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag is beautiful and love the color
customer_reviews.text: Bag is beautiful and love the color. However it isn't big enough to fit a laptop. Big enough for my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Camotita0516

customer_reviews.title: Looks lovely, but no so user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful purse, but too stiff. Won't hold all of my stuff. Hopefully once I break it in, leather will soften up.
customer_reviews.author: trinarn

customer_reviews.title: Completely not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Extremely rough leather, the binding is so tight on the sides of the bag that you can hardly open the purse wider than the zipper width at the top, and overall very low quality and plain design, for almost $400.00. It’s also quite small. I have bought comparable bags at comparable prices for MUCH better quality. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Miles
